connect20/ma2_widget_tabs_free.name: connect20/Ma2_Widget_Tabs_Free

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/ma2_widget_tabs_free.description: Ma2 WidgetTabs Free for Magento is a widget module from MagenMarket.com which helps you create tabs widget instances to put anywhere in your Magento store. Tab's content can be text or any widget.
